question:
The attached Excel file contains the sales of menu items for a local fast-food chain. What were the total sales that the chain made from food (not including drinks)? Express your answer in USD with two decimal places.

[Note: There is an attached file at path: /Users/charles/spec_tool_call/gaia_dataset/level1/example_051/7bd855d8-463d-4ed5-93ca-5fe35145f733.xlsx]

args.code:
data = [
{'Location': 'Pinebrook', 'Burgers': 1594, 'Hot Dogs': 1999, 'Salads': 2002, 'Fries': 2005, 'Ice Cream': 1977, 'Soda': 1980}, 
{'Location': 'Wharvton', 'Burgers': 1983, 'Hot Dogs': 2008, 'Salads': 2014, 'Fries': 2015, 'Ice Cream': 2017, 'Soda': 2018}, 
{'Location': 'Sagrada', 'Burgers': 2019, 'Hot Dogs': 2022, 'Salads': 2022, 'Fries': 2023, 'Ice Cream': 2021, 'Soda': 2019}, 
{'Location': 'Algrimand', 'Burgers': 1958, 'Hot Dogs': 1971, 'Salads': 1982, 'Fries': 1989, 'Ice Cream': 1998, 'Soda': 2009}, 
{'Location': 'Marztep', 'Burgers': 2015, 'Hot Dogs': 2016, 'Salads': 2018, 'Fries': 2019, 'Ice Cream': 2021, 'Soda': 2022}, 
{'Location': 'San Cecelia', 'Burgers': 2011, 'Hot Dogs': 2010, 'Salads': 2012, 'Fries': 2013, 'Ice Cream': 2015, 'Soda': 2016}, 
{'Location': 'Pimento', 'Burgers': 2017, 'Hot Dogs': 1999, 'Salads': 2001, 'Fries': 2003, 'Ice Cream': 1969, 'Soda': 2967}, 
{'Location': 'Tinseles', 'Burgers': 1967, 'Hot Dogs': 1969, 'Salads': 1982, 'Fries': 1994, 'Ice Cream': 2005, 'Soda': 2006}, 
{'Location': 'Rosdale', 'Burgers': 2007, 'Hot Dogs': 2009, 'Salads': 2021, 'Fries': 1989, 'Ice Cream': 2005, 'Soda': 2011}
]

food_cols = ['Burgers', 'Hot Dogs', 'Salads', 'Fries', 'Ice Cream']

total_food_sales = sum(sum(row[col] for col in food_cols) for row in data)

total_food_sales
